extendedInfo.description: Just Score - Live Cricket Score, with Voice!Do you want to follow scores of live cricket matches, without worrying about the battery life or data usage? Do you want to listen to cricket scores while driving? "Just Score" is the app for you.Key Features:  * Listen to Cricket scores and match updates (Text-to-Voice capability)  * Extremely light and fast (works on 2G/Edge Networks as well)  * Low battery consumption and data usage  * Domestic and International Cricket matchesThis app lets you follow both Domestic and International Cricket Matches. You can follow a match to receive updates. The app also has text-to-voice capability, which is useful to get match updates while you are driving without even touching or seeing the phone. This app is extremely light and fast, fetches scores with only a minimal data usage and absolutely taking no toll on the battery, allowing you to run this app in the background all day long.Keywords: JustScore, Just Score, Cricket Scores, Live Cricket, IPL, CT, Champions Trophy, India, Pakistan, Australia, England, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka, New Zealand, Zimbabwe, Kenya, Canada, West Indies, South Africa, 2G, 3G, 4GPlease report any defects or crashes to help us make this a better app

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Amazing app. Good one. Keep it up.
reviews.author: Nikhil Thakkar

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Its a very good app, for just seeing score.
reviews.author: Roopesh Kumar

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Good app. Notification can be updated only if there is a change in score. One match is stopped due to rain but. Just a thought.
reviews.author: Srihari Karanth

reviews.title: cool..
reviews.comment: the voice notification is very innovative and useful. :) keep it up.
reviews.author: Shrinidhi Karanth
